title: Resolution on new monitor
body: Hi, I installed a new monitor recently and when I start up league, it uses the old resolution and end up with a bug splat. When I am in game and try to change the resolution, it doesn't give me the 1920 x 1080 option, the max it will go 1600 x 920. The 1920 x 1080 is simply not in the list when I go into the video tab. Do I need to reinstall league?

replies.body:
This may be caused by a corrupt input file that prevents your native resolution from showing up. The guide below will assist you in resetting your inputs.

>**Log into the game** then navigate to your installation directory, which should be in:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

>Delete the folder named **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted the Config folder, hop into a custom match and confirm the resolution shows up now. Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you so much for the help, it's working now. I really appreciated it
